survey_name: Employee Feedback on Digital Collaboration Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness, usability, and satisfaction with digital collaboration tools used in the workplace.

questions.question_text: Which digital collaboration tools do you regularly use for work? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for unlisted tools.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which digital collaboration tools do you regularly use for work? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of the digital collaboration tools you use?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure mobile-friendly radio buttons.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of the digital collaboration tools you use?

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using digital collaboration tools?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with character limit.

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using digital collaboration tools?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with digital collaboration tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with digital collaboration tools?

questions.question_text: What additional features would improve your experience with digital collaboration tools?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions for improvement. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with character limit.
